entry.title: So much to catchup on
entry.content:
So much has happended since I wrote my last blog entry on my old blog in April, 2012. There are a couple of things I want to write about. I'm listing them here to remind myself to to it when I have the time.

  • Burning man
    I went to Burning Man in 2014. Camped in the desert for a week. It was an awesome experience.
  • Rotation in China
    I went back to Beijing in the first quarter of 2015. Met a lot of old and new friends. It was a lot of fun.
  • Sabbatical
    I took 3 months off after returning to the U.S. from the rotation in China. It was a good time off to do some thinking, learning and reading.
  • Some coding
    I picked up a bit of coding during my sabbatical.
    • Python (mainly used to solve Leetcode questions)
    • Javascript
      • Node.js
        • Promise, Async
      • Angular.js
      • Meteor.js

entry.title: hello world
entry.content: Using Octopress. Found a theme. Time to sleep now. Not much to write about today.
